channel.title: [Help] Understanding GFX Animations
channel.description:
Im sorry for asking so many questions but my others arent getting answered anyway :/. What I wanna know is how to make GFX'x like how does RS server or client register that GFX to that item. Anyone have any links to tutorials to those
And off that subject I had an idea of making something like the ape necklace that turned you into a monkey. But I wanna make ifferent ones to turn you into your custom player models. Anyway that can be done/has been done?
